articles.title: Noise Air Buds 2, Wings Phantom 200 launched in India - ETTelecom
articles.description: The Noise Air Buds 2 features 13mm drivers for audio. The TWS earbuds connect wirelessly via Bluetooth 5.3 and the device comes with Environmental Noise Cancelation (ENC).
articles.content: NEW DELHI: Noise and Wings have launched their latest true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds in India, the Air Buds 2 and Phantom 200, at Rs 1,799 and Rs 999, respectively. The Noise Air Buds 2 features … [+1118 chars]
